meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>sleep</kanji> like a <kanji>monk</kanji>, as in you never stop sleeping (because you sleep while you meditate). When you sleep like a monk like this you're constantly <vocabulary>oversleeping</vocabulary>, probably because you're up late doing sutras or something. You're a <vocabulary>late riser</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: These are the readings you learned with the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
